name: Fighter Aircraft Strike War
description:
A powerful visual impact of the vertical handling and fighter shooting arcade action game,
Drive the most advanced fighter aircraft in space combat with the enemy plane.
With beautiful tools and complexed stage make the game fascinating.
The fast-paced game allows you to thrilling.
Shocking picture of the game will bring you a sense of super hit, and immersive combat experience.
This game offers you more fighter aircrafts.
Get gems by fighting, and use them to upgrade your fighters.
You will be challenged different shapes and devastating barrages.
The game is easy to operation which will enable you to calmly face the challenges.

Features:
* More than 5 battle maps * BOSS challenge system  * Weapon upgrade system
* Realistic game scenes and magnificent graphics
* Smooth controls and engaging power-ups * Exciting and astonishing sound effects and electronic rock soundtrack.

Declair:
If you like this game, please give a five-star rating, if you have any suggestions please email to us, we will try to revise it and email to you for thanks!
